long_description: A moisture-wicking running shirt with smooth seams that you can use for any workout, the Brooks Versatile men's T-shirt is ready to go when you are. Moisture-wicking polyester offers just a touch of built-in stretch, top-notch performance and high mobility. Flatlock seams maximize motion and minimize abrasion. The moisture-wicking Brooks Versatile men's T-shirt is semifitted. Closeout.
short_description: A moisture-wicking running shirt with smooth seams that you can use for any workout, the Brooks Versatile men's T-shirt is ready to go when you are.
